name: AFGReplicationDetailActor
comment: E.g. inventory stacks don't need to be replicated until a player interacts with the building.

methods.name: CreateReplicationDetailActor
methods.comment: Creates a ReplicationDetailActor and attaches it to the owner character if one doesn't already exist

methods.name: UpdateInternalReplicatedValues
methods.comment: Refreshes the replicated data values based on their corresponding values in the owning actor

methods.name: OnPreSaveGame
methods.comment: Run any logic needed prior to saving. If pointers have been moved this is the spot to copy over actor representation data.

methods.name: OnDismantleRefund
methods.comment: Run any logic needed in order to get the correct dismantle refunds.

methods.name: FlushReplicationActorStateToOwner
methods.comment: Flushes the state of the replication detail actor over to its owner. E.g. Inventory components copy their state.

methods.name: HasCompletedInitialReplication
methods.comment: Validation function to check whether initial replication has occurred. Only works on client and overriden implementations.

methods.name: IsNetRelevantFor
methods.comment: Checks whether this actor is relevant to a connection.

properties.name: mOwningBuildable
properties.comment: Owning AFGBuildable to this replication detail actor object. Should never be null.
